column5: Could someone PM me Gerrits' phone number please. I am hoping to make him and myself happy.
You still scrambling to make that trip on the 18th? Was wondering.  Hope it works out for you Albert.  I thought of Gerritt immediately myself but was told he couldn't make it.
I wish I can make it Albert but divorce is expensive I hear.
Dan it's such a great opportunity, I'd love to see you go.  Chance like this doesn't come along all that often.
Dan, Dan, Dan...   <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/JoqDYcCDOTg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Yes Dan, let me talk to your wife..... Thank Pigeontroller
Looks like I am going solo by myself. Sigh.
If worst comes to worst that's not such a bad thing. If possible we should go over a map together before you go.
